refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect2.title: union GTypeCValue
refsect2.para: A union holding one collected value.

refsect2.title: G_VALUE_COLLECT()
refsect2.para: Collects a variable argument value from a va_list. We have to implement the varargs collection as a macro, because on some systems va_list variables cannot be passed by reference.

listitem.simpara: a GValue return location. value is supposed to be initialized according to the value type to be collected
the va_list variable; it may be evaluated multiple times
flags which are passed on to the collect_value() function of the GTypeValueTable of value.
a gchar** variable that will be modified to hold a g_new() allocated error messages if something fails

refsect2.title: G_VALUE_LCOPY()
refsect2.para: Collects a value's variable argument locations from a va_list.

listitem.simpara: a GValue return location. value is supposed to be initialized according to the value type to be collected
the va_list variable; it may be evaluated multiple times
flags which are passed on to the lcopy_value() function of the GTypeValueTable of value.
a gchar** variable that will be modified to hold a g_new() allocated error messages if something fails

refsect2.title: G_VALUE_COLLECT_FORMAT_MAX_LENGTH
refsect2.para: The maximal number of GTypeCValues which can be collected for a single GValue.
